Title: VICI Properties
Manager: Morgan Stanley/ Goldman Sachs/ BofA Merrill Lynch
CO_managers: Barclays/ Citigroup/ Deutsche Bank Securities/ Co-Managers/ Credit Suisse/ UBS Investment Bank/ Stifel/ Citizens Capital Markets/ Wells Fargo Securities/ Nomura/ Union Gaming
Business: (Note: “Our common stock is quoted on the OTC Markets Group, Inc.’s “Grey Market” under the symbol “VICI.” )We are an owner, acquirer and developer of experiential real estate assets across leading gaming, hospitality, entertainment and leisure destinations. Our national, geographically diverse portfolio consists of 19 market-leading properties, including Caesars Palace Las Vegas, one of the most iconic entertainment facilities on the Las Vegas Strip. Our entertainment facilities are leased to leading brands that seek to drive consumer loyalty and value with guests through superior services, experiences, products and continuous innovation.
